# Testing data from US, contamination

```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo= FALSE}
# Spurce of data: https://www.epa.gov/outdoor-air-quality-data/download-daily-data

data <- read.csv("https://www3.epa.gov/cgi-bin/broker?_service=data&_server=134.67.99.91&_port=4087&_sessionid=RymTPYt8Q52&_PROGRAM=dataprog.ad_viz_plotval_getdata.sas") # Only NY 

data <- read.csv("https://www3.epa.gov/cgi-bin/broker?_service=data&_server=134.67.99.91&_port=4086&_sessionid=R/L.Sbt8Q52&_PROGRAM=dataprog.ad_viz_plotval_getdata.sas") # All NY zone
dim(data)
```

```{r}
unique(data$Site.ID)
```

```{r }
library("tidyverse")
sum_data <- data %>% 
  group_by(Site.ID) %>%
  summarise_all(.funs = first)

sum_data
```


```{r }
library("leaflet")
```


```{r }
map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = sum_data$SITE_LONGITUDE, lat = sum_data$SITE_LATITUDE)

map
```
